historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 11-1730.

1973 Ed., § 11-1730.

DC CODE § 11-1730

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Judges of the courts shall furnish time and attendance records pursuant to sections 11-709 and 11-909 to the respective chief judges, with a copy to the Executive Officer.
All nonjudicial personnel of the courts shall furnish such reports and information to the Executive Officer as the Executive Officer shall request.

title.text: Organization and Jurisdiction of the Courts. (Refs & Annos)

chapter.text: Administration of District of Columbia Courts. (Refs & Annos)
